aircraft.value: Mantis Recon - AC-4118-789 at Base Delta

defect_observed.value: Inverter output voltage deviation. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Emergency Power component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 28/02/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 01/03/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 03/03/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 03/03/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 06/03/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Inverter output voltage deviation. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Emergency Power component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
